section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The purpose of the venture is determined by the managers, but no specific parameters are set forth as to how this will be determined. The discrepancy here is that the members should be determining this not the managers.

section: Member Contribution Description BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The agreed value for BorrowMoney.com, inc is ‘To be determined USD’ which is ambiguous and incomplete. This lack of a defined value creates uncertainty regarding the actual capital contribution of BorrowMoney.com, inc, potentially leading to disputes over the allocation of profits, losses, and ownership within the joint venture. Furthermore, the values contributed by JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is listed twice and contradictory because they provided $60,000 from contracts plus 10% revenue and also the value of the agreed contribution is listed as $3,500,000.00. It should only be listed once and not have two different figures.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: The language here is ambiguous. This clause does not specify any objective criteria or standards for determining the value of the Venture or a withdrawing Member's interest. The phrase 'in a manner deemed appropriate' and 'at the discretion of' grants broad and unchecked authority to the remaining members, which could lead to unfair or biased valuations.
